1.title: Lets start!
1.text:
Use the arrows to move
and catch all the coins
in time!

2.title: Treasures
2.text:
Use the spacebar or
the HIT button (mobile)
to break them

4.title: Run!
4.text:
Take the boots to double
your speed and try to
reach your goal!

5.title: Running race!
5.text:
Are you fast enough to
reach the treasure?

6.title: Don't touch the thief!
6.text:
Always try to avoid the
thieves, except if you want
them to steal your money!

8.title: Den of thieves!
8.text:
The thieves are hiding
a treasure, go and
catch it!

9.title: Oil stains
9.text:
Walk on the oil stains will
make you slip and
slow you down.

11.title: Drains
11.text:
Sometime better just pass
under everything...

12.title: Maze
12.text:
Finish the maze on time
and get you prize!
